接口 SisGoodsRepository

    public interface SisGoodsRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<SisGoods,java.lang.Long>, SisGoodsRepositoryCustom

    • 方法详细资料

      • findAllSISGoods

        @Query(value="select goods,sis from Goods as goods left join SisGoods as sis on sis.goods=goods and sis.user=:user where goods.owner=:merchant and goods.marketable=true and goods.disabled=false and (sis.deleted=false or sis is null) order by goods.orderWeight")
org.springframework.data.domain.Page findAllSISGoods(@RequestParam(value="user") @Param(value="user")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            User user,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            @RequestParam(value="merchant") @Param(value="merchant")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Merchant merchant,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

      • findSISGoodsByCat

        @Query(value="select goods,sis from Goods as goods left join SisGoods as sis on sis.goods=goods and sis.user=:user left join Category as cat on goods.category=cat where goods.owner=:merchant and goods.marketable=true and goods.disabled=false and (sis.deleted=false or sis is null) and cat.id=:catId order by goods.orderWeight")
org.springframework.data.domain.Page findSISGoodsByCat(@RequestParam(value="user") @Param(value="user")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                User user,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="merchant") @Param(value="merchant")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Merchant merchant,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="catId") @Param(value="catId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.Long catId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        按照分类查找可上架商品
        参数:
        user - 店主ID
        merchant - 商家
        catId - 分类ID
        pageable - 分页
        返回:
        分类后的可上架商品

      • findSISGoods

        @Query(value="select goods from Goods as goods left join SisGoods as sis on sis.goods=goods and sis.user=:user where goods.marketable=true and goods.disabled=false and (sis.deleted=false or sis is null) and sis.selected=:selected order by sis.orderWeight")
org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Goods> findSISGoods(@RequestParam(value="user") @Param(value="user")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           User user,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="selected") @Param(value="selected")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           boolean selected,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        展示该小伙伴店中店的商品
        参数:
        user - 小伙伴，店中店店主
        pageable - 分组依据
        selected - 是否上架
        返回:
        销售中商品

      • getTopSisGoods

        @Query(value="select max(sis.orderWeight) from SisGoods as sis where sis.user=:user")
int getTopSisGoods(@RequestParam(value="user") @Param(value="user")
                                                                                                          User user)
